content: this 26″ long adult crochet spiral elf hat was designed to bring some fun for christmas using caron one pound yarn this hat is a continuous spiral with six different colours simultaneously the brim comprises double-stranding caron one pound white yarn with bernat pipsqueak yarn bernat pipsqueak is discontinued but you may find another eyelash fluffy yarn to play with due to the number of colours you will notice that the yarn balls don t use too much of each colour
